subject: Physics
goals: Understand the basic concepts and history of Quantum Physics, including the dual nature of light and matter.
milestones: Gain a foundational understanding of wave-particle duality and key historical experiments that led to the development of Quantum Physics.

learning_tasks.task: Read an introduction to Quantum Physics, focusing on wave-particle duality.
Watch a documentary or lecture on the history of Quantum Physics, covering key figures and experiments.

practice_tasks.task: Summarize key points from the reading and video in a short written piece.
Complete a quiz on the basic concepts of wave-particle duality.

resources: Recommended textbook chapters on Quantum Physics basics, introductory online articles from educational websites, and relevant Physics documentaries available on streaming platforms.
